page.title: 06School Fete
page.content: Each summer the school holds a fete. This year we had a Wild West Show. This is an account given by a 7 year old:_"At the Fete I went on the Tombola and won some stuffing. I had a strawberry flavoured ice cream with strawberry topping.I had a go on the "Pick a Pocket" game. Children walk around in a costume covered in pockets and you pay to take a present from a pocket. I was a squaw in the Fancy Dress Competition.My friend won first prize in the Infants and my sister won first prize in the Juniors. She won a Â£1 note." Other attractions included:_Pony rides, barbecue, various stalls, games, competitions, greasy pole and raffle. The fete raised Â£555 for school funds.
